1.label: Total Alarm Duration
1.description: Total time the Leak Sensor will beep and light its LED in the event of a leak

2.label: Mute Time
2.description: Quiet time between each Reminder Alarm

3.label: Initial Alarm
3.description: Time the Leak Sensor beeps before it is muted

4.label: Reminder Alarm
4.description: Length of each beep after the Initial Alarm

5.label: Enable/Disable Audible Alarm
5.description: Enables or disables the audible alarm (“beeping”)

6.label: Enable/Disable Water Detection
6.description: If disabled, the device will not respond in any way to detected leaks.

7.label: Basic Set Level
7.description: The value sent by the BASIC_SET command to Association Group 2
